name: 50% Shiba, 100% Mischief
description:
You play as the role of Evee and have to eat stuff that falls from the table, or hide socks a big hole in the garden without the person noticing you or he will get angry!

Controls:

To move, use WASD or arrow keys, for interactions use Space bar.

Github: https://github.com/TheElk205/9GameJamEvee/releases/tag/v1.0-GameJam
